ask_delete_transaction: Do you want to delete this transaction? If it is a shared expense, the other person will be notified of this action
invite_text_1: Send this alias to your friend, so he can generate new shared account with you
invite_text_2: Hi! This is my alias for Clavi. Download it from AppStore or Google Playstore
invite_details_alias: This is your Clavi alias. The identifier where can find you on shared accounts or project accounts.
no_results: There are no results for given criteria

LoginScreen.title: Login, and start checking all your expenses

HomeScreen.positive_balance_text: Felicitaciones, ¡tu balance es positivo! Sigue así.
HomeScreen.negative_balance_text: Lo lamento, tienes un balance negativo. Chequeá en qué se escapa tu mayor fuente de gastos.
HomeScreen.description_1: Nobody owes you money. When someone loads a movement in which they owe you (using your alias), it will appear here.
HomeScreen.description_2: You are up to date with your debts
HomeScreen.description_3: Tap on the + button to create a new income or expense
HomeScreen.no_incomes_outcomes: You don't have incomes nor expenses loaded. Press + button to add a new one
HomeScreen.no_shared_accounts: You don't have shared accounts with anyone

NewIncomeOutcome.no_reminders: There are no reminders. You can add reminders by pressing the button bellow.
NewIncomeOutcome.keyword_help: Enter one or two keywords that will help you remember the reason.
NewIncomeOutcome.user_alias_help: If you know the other person's alias, add it. We will notify you when you pay
NewIncomeOutcome.user_name_help: If you don't know the other person's alias, simply add the reference name.

ShareCosts.tutorial_text_1: Start creating your first event! Tap on the button below to add new event
ShareCosts.event_name_tooltip: Enter an identifier for the event. Example: Food at Pedro's home
ShareCosts.tutorial_text_2: Start by adding some expenses by tapping on the plus button at the bottom!
ShareCosts.error_missing_concept: If this person spent on something, you should put in what he did.
ShareCosts.error_author_repeated: There is already a name %{author} in the list. If you want to charge another expense for %{author}, touch the 3 white dots that appear next to it.
ShareCosts.removed_from_list: It has been removed from the list
ShareCosts.exceptions_consumed: %{people} people did not consume this concept
ShareCosts.select_consummers: Select the people who participated in this
ShareCosts.event_share_1: Loaded items. List of loaded items and their prices:
ShareCosts.event_share_2: Consumption. List of products consumed per person:
ShareCosts.event_share_3: Investments per person. These are the investments that each person made for this event:
ShareCosts.event_share_4: Pending payments. Summary of expenses and who should pay whom to settle accounts:
